feed.title: User vote in blocksize through fees

entry.title: User vote in blocksize through fees
entry.summary: On June 14, 2015, Jeff Garzik reposted his suggestion for the Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP100) which can be found at http://gtf.org/garzik/bitcoin/BIP100-blocksizechangeproposal.pdf. His initial email was missed due to anti-phishing filters on SourceForge's outdated mailman setup.
